ygData.subject: Re: level 20 pet location
ygData.msgSnippet: thr level 20 pet is alos in the ogre city. Goto the green blood guild. you will find it there.. :) ... Karanas ... I ... that ... wanted ... Ogre ... other ...
ygData.messageBody:
thr level 20 pet is alos in the ogre city. Goto the green blood guild. you
will find it there.. :)

>> Well I made the elusive level 20 last night, made the trek from the
Karanas
>> to Neriak to purchase my new spells, and lo...Animate dead wasn't there.
I
>> did a quick search and found another level 20 necro, and he tells me
that
>> the spell is in Oggok...hooray! :) before I make this long journey I
wanted
>> to check with you folks and make sure no one had found it closer to the
>> homeland.
>
>The only place I was able to find it was Grobb (the TROLL city, not the
Ogre
>City) ... though it may be in the Ogre City also...
>
>The 24th is there also ... so get it while you are there ... and a few
other
>of the hard to find 20 and 24th spells...
>
>Sonoroud Tomebinder.
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
>http://www.onelist.com
>Are you? If not, see our homepage for details.
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
